Summary: Biochemical reaction from simvastatin acid to simvastatin acyl glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A1 or UGT1A3.
Biochemical reaction from simvastatin to simvastatin acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by CES1 or PON1.
Biochemical reaction from simvastatin acyl glucuronide to simvastatin.
Biochemical reaction from simvastatin to 3,5-dihydrodiol simvastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A.
Biochemical reaction from simvastatin to 6-exomethylenesimvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from simvastatin acid to 6-hydroxymethyl simvastatin acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4, CYP3A5 or CYP2C8.
Biochemical reaction from simvastatin to simvastatin acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by PON1 or CES1.
Biochemical reaction from simvastatin to 3'-hydroxysimvastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A.
Transport from simvastatin to simvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1 or ABCC2.
Transport from simvastatin to simvastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLCO1B1.
